channel.title: How to add more then one portal that will take you to different places
channel.description:
I'm new to making an rsps. What I am trying to do is add a a few portals. But it seems like whenever i add a portal, it has the same options as the other portal. to use an example, my first portal is: Combat training Skill training money making tips skip tutorial
that one portal works, but then when i add another portal, it says the exact same thing as the first one, and teleports me to the same places as the first one. How do i make it so separate portals say different things, and teleport you to different places?
p.s sorry, i'm kind of bad at explaining things.

item.title: How to add more then one portal that will take you to different places
item.dc:creator: @Straylight Straylight
item.description:
@Straylight wrote:

I obviously am, something is just wrong with it and I can’t figure out what. for the first portal, i’m using 2465, then the second portal i’m using 2468. which is 2 different portals…

Read full topic
item.source: How to add more then one portal that will take you to different places
